title: Galio Question
body:
When Galio Is inactive, what pose is he in?

I imagine he always returns to a specific pose and I've been curious to what that is.

Idk if I missed this info anywhere

replies.body: He is T-posing on the Noxian mages to assert complete dominance

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeTheSmurfMage,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=k3xo9Hv2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-12T13:07:07.596+0000)
>
> He is T-posing on the Noxian mages to assert complete dominance

This is canon now.

Just have a giant gargoyle colossus T-posing at the gates of Demacia.

Begone Thotxians.

He prefers A-pose the heretic

https://teemo.gg/model-viewer?skinid=3000
I figured he was doing like, a finger based handstand, just for maximum impracticality.

As the Demacians march to their warsong with Raptors and their knights flying overhead:

Tip tooeeee through the windowwww, by the windowwww, that is where ill be, come tiptoe  through the tulips with meeeee~ (sang if a masterful vibrato)
I'm pretty sure it's the pose you see him in the splash art: A general "power pose" as if he's ready for war.
I think his splash art is after he flew in to save the day and is just standing around, just cause. So far it looks like Tpose or Dabbing is the greatest of answers.

Hum, for me he was NOT always returning to a specific pose. He just stops moving when there isn't enough magic in the area anymore, and so if he feels it coming maybe he can take the pose preemptively, but otherwise no, he just get frozen.

At least that's the feeling I got reading his story with Lux.

I've always imagined him posing like The Thinker when he's dormant:

http://www.musee-rodin.fr/sites/musee/files/styles/zoom/public/oeuvres/visuels/jdc_b458.jpg
